'''Don Taylor''' is the husband of [[Audrey Taylor]].

==History==
Don came to the hospital with his wife, Audrey, when she had a large abdominal tumor. The doctors wanted to operate, but Audrey was only concerned with living long enough to attend her daughter's upcoming wedding. After the doctors presented their surgical plan, Audrey wanted to refuse surgery, but Don said that he needed her and their daughter needed her, so she should let them try. She agreed and her tumor was removed successfully.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Audrey Taylor]].

===Familial===
He has a daughter, Kim. When his wife didn't want to have surgery, he said that their daughter needed her to be alive.
